segments.text: Aren ’ t you going to swim ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? Don't you know I can't swim ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are not telling me that we drove 50 miles to come here for just sunbath , are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , don't shout . Come here ! Sit closer . Now , Jim , we ’ Ve had a lovely day . Don't spoil it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about your beautiful bathing suit ? We shopped all day . Don't you want to show it off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everybody who walks past me sees it . Besides , it's a good sunbathing suit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Suit yourself . I am going swimming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you get me a beach umbrella and a deck chair ? I am really tired of lying in thousand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've got a better idea . Why don ’ t we hire a boat and go for a ride ? What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you serious ? That will be wonderful !
segments.speaker: S2
